news.title: Girl gets heels stuck in drain pipe.
news.description: As Amelia was attempting to retrieve her wedding band from the endless abyss of her home's sink-hole, her heel got stuck in the drain pipe.

news.title: Ryan becomes the president of the United States
news.description: President Obama hands down his position to Ryan Heuple after encountering him on the street.

news.title: Josue becomes the Bum of Boomsville
news.description: Josue decided to quit his job and life to become a full-time bum. After months of aimless dedication, he has gained the title of Bum of Boomsville

news.title: You won't believe where Bunker lives!
news.description: After intense questioning, Bunker has admitted that he does not, in fact, live in a bunker. He has disclosed that he is actually currently living in a Lamborghini in the Hollywood Hills
